#### John Snow's Cholera map

This is the dataset of the famous cholera map in central London in 1854, made by Dr. John Snow

The folder contains the street network, point data for the location of the pumps -one of which was contaminated with cholera- and a polygon file with building blocks from the Ordnance Survey (OS data Â© Crown copyright and database right, 2015). An explanation of the data sources is provided in the companion text file `README.txt`.

All the necessary data are available as a single download from the course website on the following link:

> [http://darribas.org/gds16/content/labs/data/john_snow.zip](content/labs/data/john_snow.zip)
